name: Airplane Flight Pilot Parking Mania Plane on Runway Race Simulator
name_original: Airplane Flight Pilot Parking Mania Plane on Runway Race Simulator
description:
Airplane Flight Pilot is a aeroplane simulator game.
Enjoy the new game of simulator parking. Your mission is to park all the airplanes as soon as they arrive on the runway. Park each airplane on the marked parking area. Play exciting levels that will challenge your parking skills. Avoid speed parking, drive carefully and do not crash your aeroplane. Avoid the bus, car and trucks on the runway of the airport.

GAME FEATURES:-

- Different airplane to drive and park
- NEW Realistic physics
- Real 3D environments, with multiple camera views

How to Play:-
Tap your iPhone/iPad on right side to drive / brake.
Tap on left to control steering.
